about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the world of Scorn with the game's original soundtrack, composed by Aethek & Lustmord.

Available in FLAC and MP3 formats.

You can access the high-quality version of the audio files by enabling the "Download high-quality audio files" option in the Steam client, under Settings - Music - Additional files.
